title: User Authentication with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using valid credentials including OAuth methods (Google, GitHub) and 2FA.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username/email and password
If enabled, complete two-factor authentication
Click the login button
Verify user is successfully authenticated and directed to role-based dashboard
Attempt login using OAuth via Google
Verify successful login and session creation
Attempt login using OAuth via GitHub
Verify successful login and session creation

title: User Authentication with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when incorrect credentials are entered and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email and password
Click the login button
Verify login is denied and an error message is displayed
Input valid credentials but fail 2FA verification
Verify login is denied and an error for 2FA failure is shown

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users only have access to features and data according to their assigned roles (Administrator, Physiotherapist, Intern, Patient).

steps.description: Log in as Administrator
Verify access to user management, financials, stock, and clinic data
Log in as Physiotherapist
Verify access to patient records, clinical documentation, AI reports, and appointments
Log in as Intern
Verify limited read-only access to patient and scheduling information for observation
Log in as Patient
Verify access to personal records, exercises, appointments, and communication features only

title: Prevent Duplicate Patient Records by CPF Validation
description: Verify the system prevents creation of duplicate patient records using CPF validation and advanced search filters.

steps.description: Attempt to create a new patient record with a CPF that already exists in the system
Verify that the system blocks duplicate creation and shows an appropriate validation error
Search for a patient using advanced filters with partial or similar CPF
Verify that existing patient records are accurately found and displayed

title: Appointment Scheduling with Conflict Prevention and Recurrence
description: Verify that the appointment system prevents scheduling conflicts and supports recurring appointments with notifications.

steps.description: Schedule an appointment for a patient with a physiotherapist at a given date and time
Verify appointment is successfully created and shown on calendar
Attempt to schedule another appointment at the same time for the same physiotherapist or patient
Verify that the system prevents conflict and displays a relevant warning
Create a recurring appointment series with defined intervals
Verify recurring appointments are created correctly without conflicts
Verify notifications are sent to patient and physiotherapist with appointment details

title: Clinical Documentation Auto-Save, Version Control, and Templates
description: Verify clinical notes support auto-save functionality, maintain version history, and allow template customization.

steps.description: Create a new clinical note using a predefined template
Modify content in the clinical note editor
Verify content auto-saves periodically without user intervention
Make multiple edits and save changes
Verify version history reflects all changes with timestamps
Revert to a previous version of the clinical note
Verify the clinical note content reverts correctly
Customize and save a new template
Verify the new template is available for future clinical notes

title: AI Assistant Generates Accurate Clinical Reports and Treatment Suggestions
description: Validate AI-generated clinical reports, treatment protocols, risk analysis, and financial insights meet or exceed 95% accuracy.

steps.description: Input clinical data and request AI-generated report
Verify AI report is generated with at least 95% accuracy compared to manual baseline data
Request AI treatment protocol suggestions based on patient clinical profile
Verify treatment suggestions are relevant and meet clinical guidelines
Trigger AI risk analysis for a patient
Verify risk analysis is accurate and coherent with patient data
Generate AI financial insights for clinic operations
Verify financial insights are accurate and actionable

title: Exercise Library Prescription with Multimedia and Contraindication Alerts
description: Verify personalized exercise prescriptions include multimedia content and alert on contraindications.

steps.description: Select exercises from the library and create a personalized exercise plan
Verify prescribed exercises include multimedia content (video, images)
Introduce a contraindication condition in the patient profile
Attempt to include an exercise contraindicated for the patient
Verify system alerts user about contraindication and prevents prescription

title: Secure Patient Portal Access and Data Security
description: Verify patients can securely access their personal records, exercise plans, schedules, and communications with encrypted data and proper logging.

steps.description: Log in as patient into the patient portal
Verify patient can view personal medical records, scheduled appointments, prescribed exercises, and messages
Attempt unauthorized access to other patient records
Verify access is denied and attempts are logged
Verify all sensitive data is encrypted in transit and storage

title: Financial Management and Payment Processing Validation
description: Verify financial transactions including payments, invoicing, and multiple payment methods (Stripe, Mercado Pago, PIX) are correctly processed and reported.

steps.description: Create an invoice for a patient consultation
Verify invoice data is accurate and linked to patient record
Process payment using Stripe
Verify payment is successfully recorded and reflected in financial reports
Process payment using Mercado Pago
Verify payment is successfully recorded and reflected in financial reports
Process payment using PIX integration
Verify PIX payment is processed, logged and correctly displayed in invoices

title: Notification System Functionality and Delivery
description: Verify notifications are sent and received properly via WhatsApp Business, email, SMS, and push notifications with correct content and alerting.

steps.description: Trigger appointment notification to patient and physiotherapist
Verify notifications are received via WhatsApp, email, SMS, and push notification
Send system alert for medication or exercise reminder
Verify notifications are timely, accurate and actionable

title: Stock Management Alerts and History Tracking
description: Verify stock for materials and equipment maintains accurate quantities, triggers alerts on low stock, and records history of stock changes.

steps.description: Add stock items and initial quantities to inventory
Consume stock through usage or transfer
Verify that stock quantities update correctly
Reduce stock to below alert threshold
Verify system triggers low stock alert notification
View stock history for a particular item
Verify history shows accurate records of all stock adjustments

title: Task Management Prioritization, Status Tracking, and Notifications
description: Verify task creation, prioritization, status updates, and notifications work as intended for clinic staff.

steps.description: Create new tasks and assign priorities
Verify tasks display with correct priority ordering
Update task statuses (e.g., pending, in-progress, completed)
Verify statuses update and are visually differentiated
Trigger notifications on task assignment or status change
Verify appropriate users receive notifications timely

title: Compliance with LGPD, Data Encryption, and Audit Logging
description: Verify that system complies with LGPD data protection regulations, encrypts sensitive data, and logs all data accesses and modifications securely.

steps.description: Access sensitive patient data as authorized user
Verify data is encrypted in storage and transit
Attempt unauthorized data access
Verify access is denied and event is logged in audit system
Modify clinical or financial records
Verify modification is logged with user, timestamp and change details

title: System Load Time and Offline Support
description: Verify that application meets load time requirements with Progressive Web App offline support, maintaining functionality during disconnected states.

steps.description: Open the system dashboard under normal network conditions
Verify load time is within acceptable limits
Turn off network connection and operate offline
Verify offline access to cached data and basic functionalities
Reconnect network and verify data sync
Verify offline data is synchronized with backend without loss

title: End-to-End Integration Test for Critical Flows
description: Check that full workflows for login, appointment scheduling, patient record management, clinical documentation, AI assistance, and payments operate correctly end-to-end.

Schedule a new appointment for an existing patient
Access the patientâ€™s medical record and add new clinical documentation
Request an AI-generated report for the patient
Verify AI suggestions and finalize clinical note
Generate an invoice and process patient payment
Verify all steps complete successfully and data is consistent across modules
